BasicInfo.short: eXpresso provides SaaS-based, real-time document collaboration services for Microsoft Office suites.

Products.name: eXpresso
Products.description: eXpresso brings the online collaboration features that MS Office lacks, without replacing or competing with Office.

Products.name: eXpresso Add-In for Microsoft Office
